title: Real-Time Emotion-Based Adaptive Social Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social science knowledge and professional work experience
context.additional_context: Customized social sector competency enhancement program for working professionals. Skill-based learning utilizing VR simulations in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can resolve social conflict scenarios presented in VR simulations with 80% accuracy.
Learners can maintain average concentration levels (based on emotional analysis) measured in real-time during educational courses at over 70%.
Learners can concretely propose solutions to job-related social problems through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
